description.p: This addon adds the GUI part of the iParapheur application integration.
iParapheur from Adullact is a system that let users sign document with certificates stored into their browser.

The Nuxeo integration let appear to Document that implements file schema a button to prepare a signature workflow into Adullact. When clicked a new Tab appear with a form to let the user define parameters for this external workflow. The form filled, a new Workflow is created into iParapheur. When the document is validated into iParapheur. The file signed is stored back to the initial document with the signature.
